entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Hornepayne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:47 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
